name: Arabic lang classifier
body:
### Arabic/Farsi Language Classifier
This project was inspired by the Python [langid module](https://github.com/saffsd/langid.py). This is a generic language classifier that uses the frequency of 3 character sequences as features for a [Naive Bayes classifier](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naive_Bayes_classifier).

### Method
I wanted to assess to what extent the 3-character feature space could distinguish between two languages that are often confused.
